content: two regimental cowls each shown in three colors of the lamb & kid birdie regimental cowl by jennifer evans for the lamb & kid our alpaca and silk blend birdie is a firm favorite for all kinds of projects held double knit by itself or stranded along with another yarn for this project we invite you to pick three colors and enjoy the color play of simple regimental stripes knit into this hybrid triangular shawl and cowl it s an easily styled piece that you ll knit again and again finished measurements approx 22 circumference at neck opening 42 circumference at bottom x 20 deep along center spine needles needles listed are suggested gauge needle us 7 4 5mm 24 circular needle tools darning needle 5 markers gauge gauge is not critical for this project although it may affect yardage requirements you want a finished fabric with drape and body regimental cowl approx 16 sts and 24 row/rounds = 4 in stockinette st using shown in the lamb & kid birdie in colors gauge needle after
